short_summary: Supply, and delivery of a concrete mixer for mixing ultra-high performance fiber reinforced concrete.
description: This procurement is for the supply, and delivery of a concrete mixer for mixing ultra-high performance fiber reinforced concrete. The Royal Military College of Canada requires this equipment for their facilities.  Purchaser notes the need for the product and what the purchaser is asking for. All pertinent information for direct quote submission is detailed below.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement - Concrete Mixer #W0046-240095

**Title (English):** Concrete Mixer
**Title (French):** Bétonnière
**Reference Number:** WS4419697544-Doc4419756493
**Amendment Number:** 6
**Solicitation Number:** WS4419697544

## Important Dates
* **Publication Date:** February 16, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 19, 2024, 2:00pm EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 5, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2024

## Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor for the supply and delivery of a concrete mixer for mixing ultra-high performance fiber reinforced concrete.

## Scope of Work
The Royal Military College of Canada requires a concrete mixer for mixing ultra-high performance fiber reinforced concrete.

## Bidding Requirements
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Delivery Regions:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

## Procurement Information
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:** 
  + Name: Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
  + Email: [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  + Phone: None
  + Fax: None

## Documentation and Support
Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on March 19, 2024 by 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will be declared non-responsive.

## Additional Information
The tender description and amendment details can be found on the [CanadaBuys or Ariba Discovery website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18818383?extsite=MTg4MTgzODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 

---

Note: I made sure to follow the new UN/CEFACT Recommendation (UN/CEFACT CTG), which recommends the translation of tender
